snippet: A group that had set up a Web site and raised money for the Knox family celebrated the overturning of her homicide conviction in Italy.
lead_paragraph: A group that had set up a Web site and raised money for the Knox family celebrated the overturning of her homicide conviction in Italy.

headline.main: American Student’s Supporters in Seattle Cheer Ruling in Italy
headline.print_headline: American Student’s Supporters in Seattle Cheer Ruling in Italy
headline.seo: Amanda Knox’s Supporters Gather to Cheer Italian Ruling
